title: About the new SG skins!
body: Does anyone know if there is going to be changes in new SG skins until they're available? By my opinion I would like some changes in SG syndra's skin, like her voice. Just a thought tho. I also would really like to know how do they get together in the story with the other SG skins! {{champion:81}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:134}}

replies.body:
Hi Queen Vãnilla! 

All of the Star Guardians are in the 7.17 build (which is the current patch), and as such, won't be receiving additional changes.

For a bit of context, changing the processing of a particular character's voice isn't feasible once content hits PBE. It isn't a filter, but rather, each line is processed individually. In Syndra's case, it was a conscious choice not to alter her voice, partially because we didn't have her *unprocessed* VO to work with, in addition to the team deciding early on that it wasn't detrimental to the skin's thematic/experience. 

Hopefully we'll be able to share more with ya soon! ^-^

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=HvvaUHY9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-28T23:19:22.532+0000)
>
> Hi Queen Vãnilla! 
> 
> All of the Star Guardians are in the 7.17 build (which is the current patch), and as such, won't be receiving additional changes.
> 
> For a bit of context, changing the processing of a particular character's voice isn't feasible once content hits PBE. It isn't a filter, but rather, each line is processed individually. In Syndra's case, it was a conscious choice not to alter her voice, partially because we didn't have her *unprocessed* VO to work with, in addition to the team deciding early on that it wasn't detrimental to the skin's thematic/experience. 
> 
> Hopefully we'll be able to share more with ya soon! ^-^

Why ezreal, by the way? Not complaining, but we didn't get Urgot.
Because SG Urgot is a meme, and has a harder model to work with? These skins come out every year so wait for the next one.

We explained some of the reasoning [here](https://www.riftherald.com/interviews/2017/8/8/16113414/star-guardian-lol-skins-event-ahri-ezreal-miss-fortune-soraka-syndrahttps://www.riftherald.com/interviews/2017/8/8/16113414/star-guardian-lol-skins-event-ahri-ezreal-miss-fortune-soraka-syndra), in an interview. :)

But that says nothing about SU Urgod.

I want to see him as a first star Urgot walking around with girly looking table legs and a giant mario star suit with glitter everywhere.
what happened to the recall music for the new SG skins, is that still coming?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=HvvaUHY9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-28T23:19:22.532+0000)
>
> Hi Queen Vãnilla! 
> 
> All of the Star Guardians are in the 7.17 build (which is the current patch), and as such, won't be receiving additional changes.
> 
> For a bit of context, changing the processing of a particular character's voice isn't feasible once content hits PBE. It isn't a filter, but rather, each line is processed individually. In Syndra's case, it was a conscious choice not to alter her voice, partially because we didn't have her *unprocessed* VO to work with, in addition to the team deciding early on that it wasn't detrimental to the skin's thematic/experience. 
> 
> Hopefully we'll be able to share more with ya soon! ^-^

Is music for the recalls still coming though? :O
Yep - a tad later than expected, but it'll be in 7.18 for sure!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=HvvaUHY9,comment-id=000000020000,timestamp=2017-09-08T15:55:30.919+0000)
>
> Yep - a tad later than expected, but it'll be in 7.18 for sure!

Yay! I just heard them on PBE. The recall music seals the deal for me. :D

Thank you for answering ^^ and I understand. Can't wait to see more! 

Also AKENERO I think they already said why Ezreal, he is closer to the anime boy style than any of the characters.{{champion:81}}
